name: BLEP
description:
BLEP (another PICO-8 game from me) Controls

Z: Start game/cycle things to move (eyes, nose)
Arrows: move the things
S: Randomise whole face
D: Change eye type
F: Change face type
X: Cycle blep amount

Commentary

Thrown together in a few hours but really came out well I think. It's a lot of fun to mess with.

Begun just before this tweet: https://twitter.com/PROGRAM_IX/status/891085721955688448

Lexaloffle BBS thread: here.

#1GAM February 2017.
